/* 상품 자동 증가 코드 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(g_code) = 0 THEN 'g001' ELSE CONCAT( 'g', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(g_code, 'g', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) +1,3,'0') ) END AS goodsCode FROM tb_goods;
/* 상품등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_goods (g_code, g_name, g_price, g_seller_id, g_reg_date) values (#{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsSellerId}, CURDATE());
mapper.select: /* 상품정보 */ SELECT g.g_code, g.g_name, g.g_price, g.g_seller_id, g.g_reg_date, m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_email FROM tb_goods AS g INNER JOIN tb_member AS m ON g.g_seller_id = m.m_id;
